long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with BrowseWiz - the ultimate AI copilot that puts multiple powerful LLM models at your fingertips! With a simple Alt+B shortcut, unlock instant AI assistance for reading, writing, and data processing. Whether you're browsing web pages, watching YouTube videos, or working with files, BrowseWiz is your smart companion! :)

ü§ñ Multi-Modal AI Chat

‚úì Seamless interaction with leading AI models (ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Llama)

‚úì Context-aware conversations based on active tab, selected text, or files

‚úì Universal chat capability for any topic or task

üîç Smart Web Navigation

‚úì Intelligent webpage comprehension with clickable references

‚úì Interactive text highlighting for easy information location

‚úì Context-based Q&A with precise page section citations

üì∫ YouTube Enhancement

‚úì Instant video transcript summarization

‚úì Perfect for educational content, tutorials, podcasts

‚úì Quick knowledge extraction from video content

üìÅ Multi-File Intelligence

‚úì Simultaneous file analysis and comparison

‚úì Cross-document information retrieval

‚úì Unified content processing

üíª Advanced Data Processing

‚úì Rich prompt library for automated data handling

‚úì Multiple format conversions (JSON, CSV, Markdown, XML)

‚úì Streamlined data extraction and transformation

üìù Content Creation Assistant

‚úì Smart email response generation

‚úì Social media post crafting

‚úì Professional content writing (blogs, essays, articles)

Experience the future of browsing with BrowseWiz - your AI-powered productivity companion! (^_^)
long.pl:
BrowseWiz is a powerful AI copilot that can give you instant access to multiple LLM models in your side panel. Just press Alt+B and ask about anything - it can read web pages, YouTube video transcriptions, URL contents and files to help you read, write, extract and transform data faster!

Our magic:

- chat with AI model (LLM - Large Language Model) in context of active tab, YouTube video, selected text, file from your system or URL link; or just chat without any context as you can with ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude or Llama

- comprehend and find information on a web page by asking BrowseWiz about it - it will include references to relevant web page sections - when click the link in side panel, page scrolls to the section and highlights cited text

- summarize YouTube videos from transcripts - perfect for tutorials, podcasts, videoblogs and more

- use powerful library of prompts to automate data extraction, data entry and transform any unstructured data in format of your desire: JSON, CSV, Markdown, XML and more

- draft any content - from social media posts, email responses (select email text and ask BrowseWiz to respond to it) to blog posts, essays or scientific articles

- attach multiple files to compare their content or find specific information with all of them at once!
